programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan decides to free Marianne and journeys to Sarawak to find his real parents. Sandokan and Marianne are captured by a rogue Dayak tribe, which happens to be Sani’s. Yanez and crew are also caught while tracking Sandokan. Forced to fight a cobra to prove his Dayak heritage, Sandokan is poisoned but survives, gaining the tribe’s acceptance. Meanwhile, Brooke and Murray defy orders and follow Sandokan’s trail.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson redefines the athletic competition, giving exceptional men and women from all walks of life the chance to test their physical strength and mental fortitude for the chance to battle on Mount Olympus in hopes of becoming a Titan.

programme.title: The Titan Games S1
programme.desc: The competition continues with competitors pushing their bodies to the limit by battling opponents in unforgiving head-to-head challenges, designed by Dwayne Johnson. Winners will advance to the ultimate challenge of Mt. Olympus, the consummate athletic test of speed, strength, agility and endurance. The male and female competitors who conquer Mt. Olympus will become a Titan, and in the end, the Titans return to battle each other. One woman and one man will be crowned Titan Champions. Dwayne Johnson serves as host and Executive Producer, Liam McHugh and Alex Mendez commentate from the skybox and Cari Champion reports from inside the arena.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets
programme.desc: As winter draws to a close, the Atlantic springs back to life. Fish that spent the winter out in the deeper water have returned. An eagle pair has set up home high above the perfect fishing spot.

programme.title: Ainsley Eats The Streets
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Leguizamo Does America
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S4
programme.desc: Everyone thinks they know Harrison Ford. They know the adventurous Nazi-fighting archaeologist and the Blade Runner from a dystopian future. But nobody really knows the man behind the movies once the cameras have stopped rolling.

programme.title: Iceland: The Puffin Sanctuary
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Costa Rica: The Rise Of Nature
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Witness how America's South and Midwest were ravaged by 148 twisters in just 18 hours.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: World's Most Amazing Walks with Robson Green 1

programme.title: Engineering Reborn 1
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures 1

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible 2
programme.desc: The training academy from Dogs Are Incredible! For pet owners struggling with issues like biting, aggression, or excessive barking from their beloved dogs who've become part of the family. Experts from various fields provide customized training methods and tailored advice — helping unruly dogs transform into well-behaved companions!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad members—Tai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tang—are involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: A Sealed Book
programme.desc: The world descends into darkness when a sealed book, said to command the forces of the universe, is unearthed in an underground palace in the desert. As adventurers race to claim its power, the palace gates open, unleashing an unseen terror and heralding a catastrophe beyond imagination.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Best In Chow

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Dining al-fresco hits new levels as host Michael Yo takes us on a tour of truly unique outdoor dining experiences - like noshing on Kampung-style food while seated in the middle of a river.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Grab your map and your appetite as host Michael Yo sets his sights on the best off-road eats. Buckle up as we hit the backroads for bison burgers in Alabama and Brussels sprouts behind bars in Connecticut.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Your table is ready and it's time to get served in the most unusual ways. Join host Michael Yo's journey to Thailand for crispy flying fried chicken, then dinner is served with a side of sassy lip service.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Tune is as host Michael Yo takes us to places set to satisfy the palate, while also challenging our ideas of a dining experience. Our first stop is a sushi-bar and game-show joint in New York City.

programme.title: 1,000 Ways to Dine
programme.desc: Join Michael Yo as he circles the world for meals that can't, won't and don't stop. Take a ride in a speedy elevator up a thousand feet to the highest revolving restaurant in Canada.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Jason has become a recluse because of a giant growth on the back of his neck. Marisa hates the red spider veins on her face, but is fearful of surgery because of previous problems.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Bryan has a genetic condition that may be causing the huge mystery bumps on his head. Chalamar cannot dress how she wants because of her ugly chest bump, which she dubs "a turd".

programme.title: The Pregnancy Scheme
programme.desc: Pregnant and newly single, Julia faces a catastrophe when she loses her job. A lifeline arrives in the form of her new friend Alana, who says she knows people who would pay for positive pregnancy tests.

programme.title: The Neighbors Are Watching
programme.desc: When a handsome neighbor moves in, a single woman trying to escape her past in the new subdivision believes she has witnessed her new neighbor committing murder. Unfortunately, nobody believes her.

programme.title: You Better Watch Out
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Aubrey is rushing to Chicago for the birth of her sister's baby. Her plane is grounded in a snowstorm, leaving her stranded for the night at a small-town airport.

programme.desc: When Theresa's mom uncovers a pile of Theresa's childhood memorabilia, it inspires Theresa to do the same in her attic, a room she's too scared to enter.

programme.title: CSI S5 E19 - 4x4
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.desc: Enormous, megalithic structures of mysterious origins. Could the ancient mysteries that exist on the Mediterranean islands of Malta be connected to local legends of alien visitation and hybrid beings?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Puma Punku in Bolivia features some of the largest stone blocks on Earth, each carved with incredible precision. Could new technology solve an old puzzle—and offer proof of alien intervention on Earth?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: The team has finally reached target depth in the Garden Shaft, but their drilling efforts may be thwarted by a legendary flood tunnel.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A man with aspirations to writing crime novels ends up the star of his own breakout story when he tries to escape from one of Mississippi's oldest and most notorious prison farms, Parchman Penitentiary.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: You thought your job was tough? Uncover the dangerous gigs of the past – from mercury-poisoned hat makers to kids crawling through chimneys – and imagine the risks behind everyday jobs of old.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true?

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Una Kang Naging Akin
programme.desc: Is there any way for Gabby to regain his other "memory" and remember the family he left behind?

programme.title: Estudyante Blues (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Working Boys
programme.desc: The wacky trio of Tito, Vic & Joey became a quartet with the addition of Bagets star, Herbert Bautista. They played jacks-of-all-trades and masters of none in this take-off from the acclaimed Working Girls.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Jabidah Massacre
programme.desc: Based on the expose made by the late Senator Benigno "Ninoy" Aquino, Jabidah Massacre chronicles the story of how a group of recruits are turned into soldiers for a secret mission - the invasion of Sabah.

programme.title: Ang Agimat Ni Pepe
programme.desc: Pepe, the naughty ward of parish priest Padre Lusano always gets in trouble with Chino, the young farmer who owns the chickens that Pepe loves to shoot at.

programme.title: Batangueño Kabitenyo
programme.desc: This is a story of Magno,who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies.He goes to Manila hoping to change.

programme.title: Markadong Hudas
programme.desc: Daniel Braganza,a leading hatchetman of a crime syndicate.He was a killer totally bereft of conscience that he earned the nickname "Markadong Hudas".

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos Sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode looks at words related to sound. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Edo's Rush Hour
programme.desc: Edo was a city of waterways. The Yoroi Ferry transported people across the Nihonbashi River, one of its main commercial arteries. For the captain, it was a high-pressure job requiring skill and guts.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 16, Day 6 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Cleaning. More than a chore, it's a way to calm the mind. Spaces, products, and system designs to encourage cleaning - explore a unique Japanese aesthetic and the potential of cleaning.

programme.title: Design Ah neo: Toilet Paper
programme.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Toilet Paper.

programme.title: Mitateru-phose #2
programme.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: A ride through Hokkaido in early summer. We meet an artisan teaching handicrafts of the indigenous Ainu to the next generation, and a legendary trainer of an unusual horse race.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: BOSAI

programme.desc: Hishikawa Seiichi (Video and craft artist) visits Tottori. Dyeing firms make fishing flags with vivid, hand-drawn designs that carry the feelings of both fishermen and people sending them gifts.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Five young men from around Japan, once withdrawn from society - a phenomenon known as hikikomori - embark on a 1,200-kilometer pilgrimage around the island of Shikoku, on a journey of self-discovery.

programme.desc: George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.desc: Young François witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.desc: When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: The Role Of A Lifetime - Episode 5

programme.title: Jim Maxwell's Ashes Memories - 2006 - Shane Warne bowls Australia to series victory at the Adelaide Oval
programme.desc: Ashes history is littered with moments that have defined and intensified the rivalry between the two nations. Jim Maxwell and Corbin Middlemas look back to 2006 when Shane Warne bowled Australia to a series win in Adelaide.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 6
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The Streets Hong Kong - Episode 3
programme.desc: Dan heads to a popular local venue on Hong Kong island for their flavourful congee. He then meets up with exciting young chef, Archan Chan, at her modern Cantonese restaurant, Ho Lee Fook.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 6
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 1
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of world news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia. (Return)

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One - Harry Garside
programme.desc: Harry Garside is the ballet dancing plumber who won bronze for boxing in Tokyo. He talks to Kurt Fearnley about his journey to the ring, and winning Australia's first Olympic boxing medal in 33 years.

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours - Episode 1
programme.desc: Around 1 in 6 people living in regional Australia have experienced discrimination. This episode will follow Maryborough's newest residents into finding jobs, housing, settling into school and the local community.

programme.title: Who The Bloody Hell Are We? - John Safran
programme.desc: Filmmaker, author and perennial troublemaker John Safran embarks on a playful quest to discover the role that Jews have played in modern Australia's story.

programme.title: Landline: India - Almonds: Cracking India
programme.desc: Cracking a new market - Australian almonds exported to India where new tastes are opening up opportunities.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Asia
programme.desc: We visit Sri Lanka and Indonesia to meet scientists saving some of our amazing animals, go behind the scenes with a plastic pollution warrior, and hit the stage with a fearless woman using humour to make a positive impact.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Rye Cave
programme.desc: At Rye on the Mornington Peninsula, Ryan plans to build a unique home, with boulders in the living room, and his bedroom in a cave.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 6
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Conan The Destroyer
programme.desc: Conan is asked by the evil Queen Taramis to accompany a beautiful young princess in finding a magic treasure. If he returns with the treasure and the princess, the Queen promises to bring Conan's beloved Valeria back from the dead. But little does he know that she plans to kill both him and the princess, and that the return of the treasure will mean the extinction of mankind.

programme.desc: Sick of his dead end, white bred existence, Jack encounters an intriguing stranger who alters his relationship with reality.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Richard Ramirez terrorised Southern California in the mid-1980s, and anyone could be a target. Growing up yearning for a father figure, he found mentorship with his sadistic cousin.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: The peaceful town of Mountain City, TN, is rocked when a beloved young couple is found brutally murdered in their home.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A young man is arrested for violating a restraining order by sending a text message. While in Virginia Beach, an 18-year-old woman is arrested for assault and battery after a fight with her brother.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The family of a DUI victim screams at the defendant; a Sovereign Citizen argues with the judge over bond; a sexual assault victim is interviewed by her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The judge must excuse the jury after an accused double-murderer goes on a rant; DUI defendant won't listen to her lawyer; laundromat vandal tries to suck up to the judge; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A rookie detective is pushed to the brink searching for a beloved man who ultimately turns up brutally murdered. Bringing the killer to justice could hang on the testimony of a jailhouse informant.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: A popular lifeguard is found dead at the community swimming pool, causing a wave of terror to flood through Leawood, Kansas.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Tara Grinstead's sudden disappearance goes unexplained for 11 years until a surprising statement to law enforcement from Bo Dukes, a former student, names his friend and former classmate as her killer.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: Detective Angela Carter takes over the case of a missing teenage girl and wonders if the key to her disappearance could lie shockingly close to home.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: La Source D'Un Échec
programme.desc: The journalist Nassima Way tries to understand why, in the suburbs of Calgary, the Tsuut'ina community lacks access to drinking water whilst the country possesses 20% of all the planet's fresh water reserves. An investigation that takes in several of Alberta's different communities.

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: 'Séduction et Pouvoir: l'art de s'apprêter à la cour'', an exhibition open to the public at the Château de Marly. How did the very first fashion week come into being? programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 2
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: "Manyika" (lit. 'Doll') and "Banana Q"

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
